Book Summaries

For book recommendations, you can follow me on GoodReads

  • Jan '2021 Atomic Habits - James Clear
  • Jan '2021 Linchpin: Are You Indispensable? - Seth Godin
  • Dec '2020 Hell Yeah or No - Derek Sivers
  • Dec '2020 Awareness: The Perils and Opportunities of Reality - Anthony de Mello
  • Oct '2020 On Writing: A Memoir of the Craft - Stephen King
  • Oct '2020 Trust Me I'm Lying: Confessions of a Media Manipulator - Ryan Holiday
  • Aug '2020 Antifragile: Things That Gain from Disorder - Nassim Taleb
  • Jul '2020 The Courage to Be Disliked - Ichiro Kishimi, Fumitake Koga
  • Apr '2020 What I Talk About When I Talk About Running - Haruki Murakami
  • Apr '2020 Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Long and Happy Life - Albert Liebermann, Hector Garcia
  • Jan '2020 Zero to One - Peter Thiel
